targets.rawSql:
WITH apq_stats AS (
  SELECT
    SUM(CASE WHEN labels->>'cache_type' = 'apq' AND metric_name = 'cache_hits_total' THEN metric_value ELSE 0 END) as hits,
    SUM(CASE WHEN labels->>'cache_type' = 'apq' AND metric_name = 'cache_misses_total' THEN metric_value ELSE 0 END) as misses
  FROM monitoring.metrics
  WHERE metric_name IN ('cache_hits_total', 'cache_misses_total')
    AND timestamp > NOW() - INTERVAL '$time_range'
    AND environment = '$environment'
)
SELECT
  ROUND(100.0 * hits / NULLIF(hits + misses, 0), 2) as hit_rate_percent
FROM apq_stats;

SELECT
  SUM(metric_value) as total_apq_requests
FROM monitoring.metrics
WHERE metric_name IN ('cache_hits_total', 'cache_misses_total')
  AND labels->>'cache_type' = 'apq'
  AND timestamp > NOW() - INTERVAL '$time_range'
  AND environment = '$environment';

panels.title: Bandwidth Saved

targets.rawSql:
WITH apq_hits AS (
  SELECT SUM(metric_value) as total_hits
  FROM monitoring.metrics
  WHERE metric_name = 'cache_hits_total'
    AND labels->>'cache_type' = 'apq'
    AND timestamp > NOW() - INTERVAL '$time_range'
    AND environment = '$environment'
)
SELECT
  total_hits,
  ROUND((total_hits * 2048)::numeric, 0) as bytes_saved,
  ROUND((total_hits * 2048 / 1024.0)::numeric, 2) as kb_saved,
  ROUND((total_hits * 2048 / 1048576.0)::numeric, 2) as mb_saved
FROM apq_hits;

panels.description: Estimated bandwidth saved by APQ (assuming ~2KB per query)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  date_trunc('minute', timestamp) as time,
  SUM(metric_value) as apq_hits
FROM monitoring.metrics
WHERE metric_name = 'cache_hits_total'
  AND labels->>'cache_type' = 'apq'
  AND timestamp >= $__timeFrom()
  AND timestamp <= $__timeTo()
  AND environment = '$environment'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time;

SELECT
  date_trunc('minute', timestamp) as time,
  SUM(metric_value) as apq_misses
FROM monitoring.metrics
WHERE metric_name = 'cache_misses_total'
  AND labels->>'cache_type' = 'apq'
  AND timestamp >= $__timeFrom()
  AND timestamp <= $__timeTo()
  AND environment = '$environment'
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time;

WITH apq_stats AS (
  SELECT
    date_trunc('minute', timestamp) as time,
    SUM(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'cache_hits_total' THEN metric_value ELSE 0 END) as hits,
    SUM(CASE WHEN metric_name = 'cache_misses_total' THEN metric_value ELSE 0 END) as misses
  FROM monitoring.metrics
  WHERE metric_name IN ('cache_hits_total', 'cache_misses_total')
    AND labels->>'cache_type' = 'apq'
    AND timestamp >= $__timeFrom()
    AND timestamp <= $__timeTo()
    AND environment = '$environment'
  GROUP BY time
)
SELECT
  time,
  ROUND(100.0 * hits / NULLIF(hits + misses, 0), 2) as hit_rate_percent
FROM apq_stats
WHERE hits + misses > 0
ORDER BY time;

panels.title: Stored Persisted Queries
panels.description: Number of unique persisted queries stored in the database

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  date_trunc('day', created_at) as time,
  COUNT(*) as new_queries
FROM tb_persisted_query
WHERE created_at >= $__timeFrom()
  AND created_at <= $__timeTo()
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time;

WITH apq_usage AS (
  SELECT
    labels->>'query_hash' as query_hash,
    SUM(metric_value) as usage_count
  FROM monitoring.metrics
  WHERE metric_name = 'cache_hits_total'
    AND labels->>'cache_type' = 'apq'
    AND timestamp > NOW() - INTERVAL '$time_range'
    AND environment = '$environment'
  GROUP BY query_hash
)
SELECT
  au.query_hash,
  LEFT(pq.query, 100) as query_preview,
  au.usage_count,
  pq.created_at,
  EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (NOW() - pq.created_at)) / 3600 as hours_since_creation
FROM apq_usage au
LEFT JOIN tb_persisted_query pq ON au.query_hash = pq.hash
WHERE au.usage_count > 0
ORDER BY au.usage_count DESC
LIMIT 20;

panels.title: APQ Request Types

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  CASE
    WHEN metric_name = 'cache_hits_total' THEN 'Hash-only (Hit)'
    WHEN metric_name = 'cache_misses_total' THEN 'Hash + Query (Miss)'
  END as request_type,
  SUM(metric_value) as count
FROM monitoring.metrics
WHERE metric_name IN ('cache_hits_total', 'cache_misses_total')
  AND labels->>'cache_type' = 'apq'
  AND timestamp > NOW() - INTERVAL '$time_range'
  AND environment = '$environment'
GROUP BY request_type;

panels.description: APQ Hits: Client sent hash-only. APQ Misses: Client had to send full query.

targets.rawSql:
WITH apq_hits AS (
  SELECT
    date_trunc('hour', timestamp) as time,
    SUM(metric_value) as hits
  FROM monitoring.metrics
  WHERE metric_name = 'cache_hits_total'
    AND labels->>'cache_type' = 'apq'
    AND timestamp >= $__timeFrom()
    AND timestamp <= $__timeTo()
    AND environment = '$environment'
  GROUP BY time
)
SELECT
  time,
  (hits * 2048 / 1048576.0) as mb_saved
FROM apq_hits
ORDER BY time;
